<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Barrister](/NPCs.aspx?ID=932)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Barristers may serve as criminal prosecutors or as legal advocates, defending the rights of those accused of crimes or named as defendants in civil cases. In a court case or other legal proceeding, the barrister is a 4th-level challenge.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Officer_Barrister.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Barrister](/NPCs.aspx?ID=932)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 232</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +10, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Sway the Judge and Jury** A barrister gains a +2 circumstance bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) or [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) something of the deciding members within a courtroom. If the barrister successfully [Performs](/Actions.aspx?ID=59) against a DC of 20 during the 20 minutes prior to the check, they increase the circumstance bonus to +4.

**Items**
court garb (functions as [fine clothing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=15)), law book (functions as [scholarly journal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=64)), [Writing Set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +4 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Cite Precedent** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101)) The barrister uses existing case law to undermine their opposition. If they succeed at a DC 20 [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) check, they impose a -2 circumstance penalty on the next [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) check an opponent attempts in a legal argument. Any further attempts to Cite Precedent fail until a new topic with different precedents is being argued.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-192" />
name: Barrister
